author: cnbc.com
title: Panduit Recognized on CRN's Data Center 100 List
text:
TINLEY PARK, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Panduit, a leading global provider of network infrastructure solutions, announced that CRN®, a brand of The Channel Company, has named Panduit to its 2018 Data Center 100 List . The annual list recognizes technology suppliers that excel at powering, supporting and protecting the complex and demanding data centers on which today’s businesses rely.
“Panduit is proud to be recognized in CRN’s Data Center 100,” said Tom Walsh, vice president – Data Center, Panduit. “Through our broad portfolio, we can help data center architects and managers unlock significant value by simplifying their planning, design, fulfillment and procurement processes to focus on achieving performance and other business requirements.”
Panduit helps drive performance, efficiency and agility by optimizing power, cooling, space and connectivity requirements through its comprehensive data center solutions, including:
Converged Infrastructure: Pre-configured for rapid installation and to optimize to the logical elements of the network, the physical infrastructure of the data center includes all necessary systems integrated within Panduit cabinets under a single part number. Connectivity Solutions: High-performance copper and fiber systems help design advanced networks such as fabric-based architectures and FCoE, as well as higher bandwidth deployments such as 10/40/50/100 Gig Ethernet LANs and 8/16/32 Gig Fibre Channel SANs to increase network throughput, reduce latency and improve reach. Cooling Optimization and Thermal Solutions: The SynapSense® Wireless Monitoring Cooling Control Solutions provides unparalleled visibility into current data center operating conditions through turnkey intelligent software and a wireless sensor mesh network (WSM) that includes robust sensing devices, gateways, routers and server platforms Data Center Infrastructure Management (DCIM): The Panduit SmartZone™ Intelligent Management Solution helps manage risk and change within the physical infrastructure by providing real-time information on the status of power, cooling, connectivity, security and environmental conditions in data center cabinets.
To learn more about Panduit’s Data Center solutions, please register for the upcoming webinar, “ How ready is your data center for Banking & Financial Services 4.0? ” featuring Tom Walsh, Vice President - Data Center, Panduit on Thursday, March 29, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. CDT.
For more information on CRN’s Data Center 100, visit www.crn.com/datacenter100/ .
About Panduit
Since 1955, Panduit’s culture of curiosity and passion for problem solving have enabled more meaningful connections between companies’ business goals and their marketplace success. Panduit creates leading-edge physical, electrical, and network infrastructure solutions for enterprise-wide environments, from the data center to the telecom room, from the desktop to the plant floor. Headquartered in Tinley Park, IL, USA and operating in 112 global locations, Panduit’s proven reputation for quality and technology leadership, coupled with a robust partner ecosystem, help support, sustain, and empower business growth in a connected world. For more information, visit www.panduit.com
